name: Pursuit
hook: Guided developers through the PERN stack, enhancing the curriculum with detailed study guides and offering hands-on practice via carefully crafted CSS mockups.

name: Corbion
hook: Streamlined data access through a revamped design, featuring a mega menu and robust search capabilities, resulting in a seamless user experience for quick information retrieval.

name: Buckeye Broadband
hook: Engineered a sleek mobile app with enhanced features, enabling users to effortlessly manage their accounts and services directly from their mobile devices.

name: Your Hearing Network
hook: Led the implementation of a new portal feature, empowering doctors to efficiently manage patients, appointments, equipment, and more, streamlining the complex doctor-patient relationship.

name: Cablivi Visopedia
hook: Created an interactive touch screen display for an exciting new drug, allowing users to comprehensively explore Cablivi's benefits without the need for a sales representative.

name: CommunityPass
hook: Redesigned the catalog, simplifying recreation and school management, ensuring an efficient and user-friendly platform for visitors to find and register for various programs, enhancing the overall user experience.
